ygData.subject: Re: Sources of combine weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Theres actually a new quest(todays patch) thats bard only I think. There are a few bard npc scouts around the world that ask you to carry packagas. One is near
ygData.messageBody:
Theres actually a new quest(todays patch) thats bard only I think. There
are a few bard npc scouts around the world that ask you to carry
packagas. One is near the entrance to feerot from innothule, two are in
freeport bard guild, and the others I'm not sure. I did the one from
feerot to freeport cause I noticed it as I was leaving to head to
freeport bank. :) Hell an extra plat for going to the bank is pretty
good.

Talonus DuPrey
Traveling Bard of Solusek Ro
